title: Reassessing the Super Bowl Race | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 359)
description:
The Cowboys, Eagles, and Texans are making a late-season push, but can they actually contend for a Super Bowl? (0:30) On this week's Take Shop, Aaron Donald and Russell Wilson need to be considered for MVP (23:30), plus the three biggest games of the week, and deciding whether you would rather have Sam Darnold or Josh Allen (33:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark 

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
